question: World Design Organization is to launch its World Design Propolis in which Indian city?
explanation: The World Design Organization is all set to launch its new global programme World Design Propolis in Bengaluru, aimed at implementing holistic progress in megacities across the world and making them sustainable. The announcement was made at the ongoing three-day Kochi Design Week (KDW), India\'s largest design conclave that kicked off at Bolgatty Island in Kochi.
